directions: Melt butter and pour into a 2- or 2.5-quart casserole or baking pan. Mix sugar, flour and milk.
Pour mixture over butter, but do not mix. Pour the LUCKY LEAF Premium Blueberry Pie Filling on top, but do not mix.
Bake for 1 hour. Serve warm with ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (21 ounce) can LUCKY LEAF® Premium Blueberry Fruit Filling
title: Simple and Sweetie Blueberry Cobbler
